titleStmt.title: Reasons humbly offer'd to the honourable the Commons of England assembled in Parliament, shewing the great loss that accrues to their Majesties in their revenue, and their subjects both at home and in their plantations abroad, by the African Company's ingrossing the sole trade of Africa ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

notesStmt.note: Date and place of publication suggested by Wing.
